==== Settings Files for PIE_2D Charts ====

===== pie2d.default  =====
Settings file available at : [[ Settings:pie2d.default | pie2d.default ]]
Plot a variable in a pie chart. Example:

====== Example Chart ======

<img src="../images/help/PIE_2D-settings.PNG" width="1024px" />

====== Code ======
<source>
{{ #widget : PieChart
  | input = 'org'
  | output = {{ 'countProjects' }}
  | query = '
    SELECT ?org (COUNT(?project) AS ?countProjects) WHERE { 
      ?org rdf:type <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization> .
      ?org rdfs:label ?label .
      ?org <http://research.data.gov.uk/def/project/project> ?project
    FILTER regex(?label, "^Te.*Ltd$")
    }
    GROUP BY ?org'
  | settings = 'Settings:pie2d.default'
  | title = 'Projects'
}}
</source>
